languages.text: "Разведчик, Ваша Светлость. Брожу по лесам, землю пробую". {n}С превеликой осторожностью мужчина достает из мешка обернутый в грязную тряпицу исцарапанный ауспекс с длинным шипом.{/n}

"I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Разведчик, Ваша Светлость. Брожу по лесам, землю пробую". {n}С превеликой осторожностью мужчина достает из мешка обернутый в грязную тряпицу исцарапанный ауспекс с длинным шипом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack, pulls out an object wrapped in a filthy rag, and removes the rag, revealing a heavily scratched auspex with a long spike.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack, pulls out an object wrapped in a filthy rag, and removes the rag, revealing a heavily scratched auspex with a long spike.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: “我是个斥候，大人。我在森林里巡逻，检查土壤。”{n}老人小心翼翼地把手伸进袋子里，从里面拿出一根带着长钉的探测器，包裹在沾满泥巴的破布里。”{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我是个斥候，大人。我在森林里巡逻，检查土壤。”{n}老人小心翼翼地把手伸进袋子里，从里面拿出一根带着长钉的探测器，包裹在沾满泥巴的破布里。”{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: 「陛下、私めは偵察者です。森の中を探索し、土を観察します」{n}老人は丁寧に袋に手を伸ばし、泥だらけの布に包まれた長いスパイク付の傷ついたアウスペクスを抜いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私めは偵察者です。森の中を探索し、土を観察します」{n}老人は丁寧に袋に手を伸ばし、泥だらけの布に包まれた長いスパイク付の傷ついたアウスペクスを抜いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: «Soy explorador, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Vago por los bosques y examino la tierra». {n}Con sumo cuidado, el anciano mete la mano en su saco y saca un aúspex arañado con una larga púa envuelta en un trapo lleno de barro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Soy explorador, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Vago por los bosques y examino la tierra». {n}Con sumo cuidado, el anciano mete la mano en su saco y saca un aúspex arañado con una larga púa envuelta en un trapo lleno de barro.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Ich bin Kundschafter, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wandere durch den Wald, ich prüfe den Boden." {n}Mit größter Vorsicht greift der alte Mann in seinen Sack und zieht einen zerkratzten Auspex mit einem langen Stachel heraus, in ein dreckiges Tuch gewickelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Kundschafter, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wandere durch den Wald, ich prüfe den Boden." {n}Mit größter Vorsicht greift der alte Mann in seinen Sack und zieht einen zerkratzten Auspex mit einem langen Stachel heraus, in ein dreckiges Tuch gewickelt.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: « Je suis un éclaireur, Votre Seigneurie. Je patrouille dans les bois et je teste la terre. » {n}Avec force précautions, le vieil homme sort de son sac un auspex rayé doté d'une longue pointe et enveloppé dans un chiffon taché de boue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis un éclaireur, Votre Seigneurie. Je patrouille dans les bois et je teste la terre. » {n}Avec force précautions, le vieil homme sort de son sac un auspex rayé doté d'une longue pointe et enveloppé dans un chiffon taché de boue.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Keşif eriyim ben {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ormanlarda gezerim. Toprağı tahlil ederim." {n}İhtiyar, büyük bir dikkatle çuvalına uzanıp çamurlu bir paçavraya sarılı, uzun dikenli, çizik içinde bir uzgören çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm a scout, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I wander the woods, I test the soil." {n}Taking great care, the old man reaches into his sack and pulls out a scratched auspex with a long spike, wrapped in a muddy rag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gözcüyüm ben {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ormanlarda gezerim. Toprağı tahlil ederim." {n}İhtiyar, büyük bir dikkatle çuvalına uzanıp çamurlu bir paçavraya sarılı, uzun dikenli, çizik içinde bir auspex çıkarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan
